abstract: Simon & Schuster, Random House and the Hachette Book Group plan to allow authors to access book sales figures directly online, matching a service Amazon has provided to authors since 2010.
snippet: Simon & Schuster, Random House and the Hachette Book Group said they would allow authors to access book sales data online, a service Amazon began providing last year.
lead_paragraph: Simon & Schuster, Random House and the Hachette Book Group said they would allow authors to access book sales data online, a service Amazon began providing last year.
